com.team23.weather.gui

Class ChangeLocationAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team23.weather.gui.ChangeLocationAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

     class ChangeLocationAction
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A ChangeLocationAction implements a ActionListener to reference a user's action. A ChangeLocationAction will be triggered when a user clicks the JButton labelled "Change Location" on the SearchForLocationPanel. A ChangeLocationAction will update the weather on ScrollableGui.
    Author:
    Andrew Bloch-Hansen, Saquib Mian
    See Also:
    App, SearchForLocationPanel, SearchForLocationActionContext, Location, ActionEvent, ActionListener
